examples.example: 春天到了，大地焕发出勃勃生机。

translate.english: Spring has come and the earth takes on a vibrant look.

examples.example: 太阳缓缓升起，新的一天又到了。

translate.english: The sun rises slowly, and a new day has come again.

examples.example: 我期待的假期终于到了，好开心呀！

translate.english: The holiday I was expecting has finally come. How happy!
